.bcl, .sha, .log - data files that was read by different boxes, 
these files contain Imei + Hash + Optional information in some cases.

Source data for calculation: Imei + Hash
Final result: Unlock code

Sample data that should be extracted from files and uploaded to server:
Imei: 351536012345678
Hash: 112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF1122334455
